name: DocBot
description: Document-analysis chatbot that lets you query the contents of the current page (PDF, Google Docs, Word Online, Excel Online, etc.).

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://api.openai.com https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com http://localhost:8000 http://127.0.0.1:8000; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self';
